item.title: George R.R. Martin Doubles Down On Dislike Of Adaptational Changes After House Of The Dragon Criticism: "[It] Annoys Me Too Much"
item.description: George R.R. Martin explains why he dislikes major changes in adaptations, mere months after he criticized House of the Dragon for altering his story.

item.title: One Star Wars Old Republic Secret Explains Why Palpatine Could Turn The Galaxy Against The Jedi
item.description: An ancient war from the Republic and Jedi Order's early history became a useful tool for Palpatine to turn the galaxy against the Jedi.

item.title: Christopher Nolanâ€™s Most Underrated Sci-Fi Movie Came Out 18 Years Ago And Set Up A Tradition That Continues To This Day
item.description: Christopher Nolan is one of the most famous directors in modern cinema, and his underrated sci-fi classic began an iconic ongoing tradition.
